regexCodeList.string: The elixir heals and soothes you.
Your mind feels stronger and more alert.

Trigger.name: GMCP Map Catchers
Trigger.script: if not zgui.map then zgui.buildMap() end

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room

Trigger.name: GMCP Rooms
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Mapper" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Mapper" zgui.map["Mapper"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = false

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.num < 2121028
return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 0

Trigger.name: GMCP Wilderness
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Wilderness" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Wilderness" zgui.map["Wilderness"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = false

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.num > 2121028
return gmcp.Room.Info.coords==""

Trigger.name: GMCP Oceans
Trigger.script: if zgui.map.current ~= "Ocean" then zgui.map[zgui.map.current]:hide() end zgui.map.current = "Ocean" zgui.map["Ocean"]:show() zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {} zgui.shipmode = true

regexCodeList.string: return gmcp.Room.Info.environment=='Vessel'
return gmcp.Room.Info.num==-2

Trigger.name: Ship Room Detected

regexCodeList.string: The ship moves
The ship drifts
You have the following allies:
^You have currently used (\w+) ally slots of your (\w+) maximum.$
^You feel an unusually strong lust for (\w+).$
^(\w+) is an ally.$
^(\w+) is an ally \(M\).$
^You feel an unusually strong lust for (\w+) \(M\).$
With an indignant grunt, you remove everyone from your list of allies.
You have no allies.
^(\w+) is now one of your allies.$

Trigger.name: Remove Ally
Trigger.script: local removeThisAlly = table.index_of(zgui.allies, matches[2]) table.remove(zgui.allies, removeThisAlly) zgui.showAllies()

regexCodeList.string: ^You declare that (\w+) will no longer be one of your allies.$
^You have the following enemies:$
^You have currently used (\d+) enemy slots of your (\d+) maximum.$
^You have currently used (\d+) enemy slot of your (\d+) maximum.$
You have no enemies.
In a moment of forgiveness, you declare that you have no enemies.
^(\w+) is now one of your enemies.$

Trigger.name: Remove Enemy
Trigger.script: local removeThisEnemy = table.index_of(zgui.enemies, matches[2]) table.remove(zgui.enemies, removeThisEnemy) zgui.showEnemies()

regexCodeList.string: ^You declare that (\w+) will no longer be one of your enemies.$

Trigger.name: wsys balance prompt
Trigger.script: if zgui.balances and wsys then zgui.showBals() end

regexCodeList.string: You see the following people here:

Trigger.name: whoHereCatch
Trigger.script: local tempI = 0 for k,v in pairs(mmp.pdb_lastupdate) do tempI = tempI + 1 zgui.whoRoomList[tempI] = k end tempI = 0 disableTrigger("whoHereCatch")

Trigger.name: Got Prompt
Trigger.script: if zgui.prompt then selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("myPrompt") end

regexCodeList.string: Your last login was from domain

Trigger.name: Log Out
Trigger.script: Adjustable.Container:saveAll("default") zgui.windows = "default" zgui.echo("Saving zGUI Window Layout As: default")

regexCodeList.string: You grow still and begin to silently pray for preservation of your soul while you are out of the land.

Trigger.name: Death Cape Growing
Trigger.script: deleteLine() if not zgui.cape then zgui.buildCape() end if zgui.cape then zgui.renewCape() end

regexCodeList.string: You feel a surge of energy course through your body as a sycophantic shoulder cape feeds upon the lifeforce of your fallen foe.
You must wait a short time before you can use a battlerage ability again.

Trigger.name: Battlerage Skill Ready
Trigger.script: if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][2][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][2][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][3][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][3][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][4][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][4][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][5][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][5][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][6][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][6][5] = 1 end if string.lower(matches[2]) == zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][7][1] then zgui.RageTable[zgui.useRageClass][7][5] = 1 end deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Your (.*) ability could be used again but you lack the necessary Rage.$
^You can use (.*) again.$
^You can use another Battlerage ability again, but none of your abilities are currently available.$
^Your rage fades away.$
^You call down a lightning bolt to destroy (.*).$
^You send a crushing wave of pressurised air at (.*), pulverising (\w+).$
^You quickly mix together several chemical by\-products and fling the toxic mixture into (.+)\t's face\, causing (him|her) to cough and choke\.$
^You sketch a bisected triangle in the air and direct the energy of cadmium to pierce (.+)\'s skin\, weakening (him|her)\.$
^You mix together the ingredients of the caustic chemical and fling it at .+\'s shield\, watching as it is consumed\.$
^You sketch out the symbol for magnesium and direct the energy of iron to sear (.+)\'s flesh\.$
^You quickly combine and throw the virulent pathogen at (.+)\. The chemical seeps through (his|her) skin but (he|she) is able to fight off the worst of its effects\.$
^You quickly combine and throw the virulent pathogen at (.+)\. The chemical seeps through (his|her) skin and wreaks havoc on (his|her) weakened regeneration\.$
^Taking care to avoid the fumes\, you quickly form the hypnotic chemical and throw it into (.+)\'s face\.$
^You twist your wrist swiftly\, slicing (.+) with a long slash of your sweeping blade\.$
^You direct your voice in a high\-pitched trill at (.+)\, dazing (him|her)\.$
^You hum a low note at .+\, causing (?:his|her|its) translucent shield to shatter as it resonates with the power of your voice\.$
^You use your powerful voice to distract (.+) with a ululating howl before stepping in with a vicious slash\.$
^Your careful footwork leads you in a tight spin past .+\, but (?:he|she|it) is able to avoid the worst of your slashing blade\.$
^Your careful footwork leads you in a tight spin past .+\, (?:his|her|its) stunned state preventing (?:him|her|it) from dodging your slashing blade\.$
^You direct a soothing song at (.+)\, enticing (him|her) into defending you\.$
^A Shin-enhanced leap flings you high into the air. You extend one knee downwards as you begin to fall, squarely striking (.*) and driving h(im|er) to the ground as you land.$
^You hurl a precise blast of Shin energy at (.*) eyes.$
^You unleash a burst of Shin energy at (.*), tearing apart h(is|er) translucent shield.$
^You twist in a tight circle, slashing (.*) with each spin.$
^You deliver a glancing blow to (.*) head.$
^You lightly stab (.*) in several key locations with your blade, causing h(im|er) to slump weakly.$
^You command the shadow of (.*) to begin siphoning away the life of its host.$
^You summon whips of shadow to viciously lash the form of (.*).$
^You spit a stream of acidic venom at (.+) who writhes in agony as the spittle seeps into (his|her) skin\.$
^You form small chunks of ice in your enormous maw\, then spit them at (.+) in a barrage\.$
^You charge quickly at (.+)\, throwing your mighty form into (him|her) and sending (him|her) staggering back\.$
^You swing your mighty tail around\, stabbing (.+) with an acid\-covered spine\.$
^You breathe a column of icy air at (.+)\'s head\, stunning (him|her)\.$
^You psychically slam your mind into (.+)\'s\, deadening (his|her) reactions\.$
^You spit a thick gob of slime at (.+)\, coating (him|her) and inhibiting (his|her) ability to heal\.$
^You slap your tail on the ground while growling at (.+)\, forcing (him|her) to recklessly attack\.$
^You breathe at (.+)\, small bolts of lightning crackling around (him|her) and sensitizing (his|her) skin\.$
^You bathe .+\'s translucent shield in your noxious breath\, dissolving it\.$
^.+\'s translucent shield cracks and fades away as you breathe an icy blast at it\.$
^.+\'s translucent shield fades away as you cover it with your deadly wyrmvenom\.$
^You blast .+ with psychic energy\, demolishing (?:his|her|its) translucent shield\.$
^You breathe a white\-hot blast of flame at .+ and burn away (?:his|her|its) translucent shield\.$
^A bolt of lightning cracks out from your maw and obliterates .+\'s translucent shield\.$
^You barrel into (.+) and knock (him|her) to the ground before stomping over (his|her) prone form\.$
^You level your draconic gaze at (.+)\, assaulting (him|her) with psychic waves of force\.$
^You breathe a long torrent of flame at (.+), igniting (his|her) skin\.$
^You open your cavernous maw and summon a blast of lightning to pulverize (.+)\.$
^You breathe a wave of icy air at (.+)\.$
^You summon a psychic storm around (.+)\, but (he|she) stands strong against the buffeting winds\.$
^Positioning your mighty head over (.+)\, you let your acidic saliva flow over (him|her)\. (He|She) screams in agony as some of the poison splashes over (him|her)\.$
^You blast (.+) with a bath of flame\, but (he|she) is able to avoid the brunt of the blast\.$
^You breathe a series of lightning strikes in a lattice around (.+)\, but (he|she) is able to quickly dart through the lattice and avoid the bulk of the lightning strikes\.$
^You breathe a series of lightning strikes in a lattice around (.+)\.(\s+)(He|She) absent\-mindedly strides into the lattice as the lightning crackles into (his|her) skin\.$
^You open your gigantic maw and spew acid on (.+)\. (He|She) dodges to the side and is only partially covered by the corrosive slime\.$
^You open your gigantic maw and spew acid on (.+)\. (She|He) is too clumsy to dodge the deluge and is coated in the corrosive slime\.$
^You open your enormous maw and let loose a mighty roar at (.+)\, causing (him|her) to quail in fear\.$
^You let loose a steady stream of cold air around (.+)\, who begins to shiver uncontrollably\.$
^You summon sparkles of psi energy around (.+)\, causing (him|her) to forget (his|her) actions as the sparkles distract (him|her)\.$
^You snap your head forward and sink your teeth into (.+)\, your poisonous teeth injecting (him|her) with a weakening toxin\.$
^You blacken (.+)\'s flesh with a quick blast of flame\, slowing (his|her) healing process\.$
^You puff small bolts of lightning at (.+)\, enraging (him|her) and causing (him|her) to attack recklessly\.$
^Gesturing at (.*), you whisper a prayer to Gaia, the Earthmother. Rising in response to your incantation, vines burst forth from the very earth to strangle (her|him).$
^At your command\, undergrowth rises from the ground under (.+) and pierces (his|her) skin\, stealing (his|her) energy and making (him|her) weak\.$

Trigger.name: Vinecrack (3 druid)
Trigger.script: zgui.rage3SkillUsed() cecho("\n"..zgui.myLinePrefix.."<white>-- Shield Broken\n") zgui.enemy.shield = false

regexCodeList.string: ^You clench one fist before .+ and vines grow up to entangle (his|her|its) translucent shield\, shattering it as they constrict\.$
^You roar in rage and spring upon (.+) and ravage (him|her) with your fangs and claws\.$
^You hold your quarterstaff aloft and focus a beam of intense sunlight on the stunned form of (.+) who hastily averts (his|her) eyes before any significant damage can be done to them\.$
^You hold your quarterstaff aloft and focus a beam of intense sunlight on (.+)\. Foolishly\, (.+) stares straight at the dazzling light and screams as (his|her) eyes are seared\.$
^You cause the tip of your quarterstaff to glow brightly before thrusting it at the face of (.+)\. (.+) recoils from the blinding light and begins to stagger about clumsily\.$
^You draw upon the power of air to summon sharp gusts of wind which begin to whip across (.*)'s exposed flesh\.$
^You summon a polar vortex in a tight field around (.*)\, chilling the small pocket so intensely that time itself begins to slow\.$
^You summon a whirlwind of flame around .+ which consumes (?:his|her|its) translucent shield\.$
^At your command\, a crystalline golem stomps over to (.*) and wraps (him|her) in a tight embrace\, squeezing the life from (him|her)\.$
^You raise your hands dramatically and summon a mighty flaming rock from the sky down at (.*)\, but (he|she) dodges aside and is only dealt a glancing blow\.$
^You raise your hands dramatically and summon a mighty flaming rock from the sky that slams into the clumsy form of (.*)\.$
^A bolt of lightning roars out from your hands as you cast a powerful spell at (.*)\, inciting sensitive nerves across (his|her) skin\.$
^You spin and strike .+ with the back of your fist\.$
^You rummage quickly through .+\'s mind\, finding the link to fine motor control before exerting a small amount of psychic force and deadening it\.$
^You focus your rage in a single powerful sidekick\, shattering .+\'s translucent shield\.$
^You leap and spin in the air\, striking .+ repeatedly with an outstretched foot\.$
^Marshalling your psychic reserves\, you hurl them in a blast at .+\.$
^Marshalling your psychic reserves\, you hurl them in a blast at .+\. (?:His|Her|Its) weakened body recoils from the psychic assault\.$
^Marshalling your psychic reserves\, you hurl them in a blast at .+\, clamping on the already jangled nerves of your target\.$
^You quickly strike .+ with the tips of your fingers\, targeting specific nerves\.$
^You charge at .+?, slamming into (?:him|her) and throwing (?:him|her) back\.$
The runes on your armour flare brightly as you adopt a defensive stance.
^You strike at .+\'s translucent shield with .+\, drawing the outline of a rough rune that detonates\, consuming the shield\.$
^You unleash a ferocious onslaught on .+?, relentlessly pounding (?:him|her) with .+?\.$

^You trace the outline of a rune in the air with .+?\. The edges catch fire as it hurtles towards .+?(?:, clipping (?:him|her) slightly as it dissipates|and s?he is unable to dodge the explosive blast)\.$
^You quickly sketch a shimmering rune in the air and send it to settle around (\w+)\.$
^You give out a chittering call and a small squirrel appears and leaps at .+ and bites (?:her|him|it)\, continuing to scamper around (?:her|him|it)\.$
^Making soothing noises\, you carefully approach .+\, assuring (?:her|him|it) that you are a friend and urging (?:her|him|it) to fight for you\.$
^You thrust forward with .+\, piercing through .+\'s shield\.$
^You leap high into the air, (.*) held high above your head as you land on top of (.*), skewering (\w+) with your weapon.$
^You utter a loud, buzzing call, and a swarm of wasps rushes in but they do little more than annoy (.*).$
^You utter a loud\, buzzing call and a swarm of wasps rushes in\, swarming over .+\'s form and stinging (?:her|his|it's) slow\-healing flesh\.$
^You cower before .+\, causing (?:her|him|it) to recklessly attack you with no regard for (?:her|his|it) own safety\.$
^You wrap (.*) in a tight headlock and repeatedly rub your knuckles painfully across (his|her) scalp.$
^You take a pinch of diamond dust and flick it at (.*) face. (He|She) begins to cough and retch to expel the fine dust.$
^You throw a handful of small metallic jacks at (.*), the sharpened points shredding (his|her) translucent shield.$
^You discreetly secret a lit firecracker to (.*). After a few moments, the firecracker explodes, leaving a blistering wound.$
^You strike up a bantering dialogue with .+\, but you\'re only able to cause a minor headache\.$
^You strike up a dialogue with .+\, gleefully mocking (?:his|her|its) forgetfulness and causing a great headache as (?:he|she|it) is not able to keep up\.$
^You whistle innocuously as you saunter by (.*), then suddenly spin and whip (her|him) in the back of the head with your blackjack, stunning (her|him).$
^Raising your hands in the air, you summon horrific visions to torment (.*).$
^Multicolored rays burst forth from your outstretched hands and strike .+ in the head, forcing (?:her|him|it) to obey your will\.$
^You gesture in a slashing motion at .+\, and small tears form in (?:his|her|its) translucent shield as chaos rips it apart\.$
^You cup your hands together and fling them outwards sending a spiral of shimmering portals into .+\'s body\.$
^You concentrate intently on .+ and watch as grotesque mutations sprout all over (?:her|his|its) body\.$
^You wave one arm at .+?\, causing a small time rift to form around (?:him|her|it)\.$
^You reach out and claw at the air, heating the body of (.*) from within.$
^You croon to the myriad minds that surround you, and send them to feast upon (.*) in a wave of chittering hunger.$
^You weave a jagged blade into being and viciously hack at (.*), opening bleeding wounds.$
^You hammer the mind of (.*) with a devastating psionic onslaught.$
^You direct nature to restrain (.*), and vines flash from nothingness into being tobind h(im|er)\.$
^You weave a great warhammer into being and with an overhand swing obliterate the magical shield surrounding (.*).$
^You burst into motion, blades materialising in your hands as you deliver a relentless flurry of blows against (.*).$
^You inspire abject terror in the mind of (.*), coaxing h(is|er) darkest fears to the surface.$
^You crack .+ over your head before repeatedly lashing .+ with it.$
^You crack (.*) lightly against (.*) flesh, awakening sensitive nerves.$
^You lash out at (.*) with your whip, stripping h(is|er) translucent shield.$
^You leap upon (.*) and sink your fangs into (.*) throat before leaping away, blood gushing from the horrific wound.$
^You step behind (.*) and trip (.*) into your waiting whip. After choking against it for a few moments,(.*) is able to slip free.$
^You draw(.*) attention with the wavering tip of one finger, then quickly snap your fingers in front of (.*) face, the sudden sound temporarily blanking (.*) mind.$
^You point an imperious finger at (.*). H(er|is) flesh blackens and sloughs off.$
^You call upon the spirit of Korkma, sending his many-tentacled form to torment (.*).$
^You point an imperious finger at (.*) and h(er|is) translucent shield fades away.$
^You point an imperious finger at (.*). Blood spurts out of (.*) eyes, ears, nose, and mouth.$
^You call upon the spirit of Vurus and form an ethereal dagger in your hand. You dash behind (.*), but are only able to strike a glancing blow as (she|he) dodges aside.$
^Warmth spreads up your arm as you gesture at (.*), filling h(er|im) with foolish bloodlust.$

Trigger.name: FixColors
Trigger.script: local game = matches[2] local func = MapExporter.colorFixers[game] if func then func() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Password correct. Welcome to (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Cryptic Prompt
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == "++" then zgui.ship.sailHealth = 100 else zgui.ship.sailHealth = tonumber(matches[3]) end if matches[4] == "++" then zgui.ship.hullHealth = 100 else zgui.ship.hullHealth = tonumber(matches[4]) end zgui.ship.shiphpbar:setValue(zgui.ship.hullHealth, 100, "Hull: ".. zgui.ship.hullHealth .." / " .. "100" .. "") zgui.ship.shipshpbar:setValue(zgui.ship.sailHealth, 100, "Sails: ".. zgui.ship.sailHealth .." / " .. "100" .. "") zgui.ship.windDirection = matches[5] zgui.ship.windSpeed = matches[6] zgui.ship.direction = matches[7] zgui.ship.speed = matches[8] deleteLine() zgui.showShip()

regexCodeList.string: You are not fallen or kneeling
There is no door to the
